MaxScore: Download and Install
First of all, you would need to download the right Version of MaxScore for your operating system. You can achieve this by visiting the MaxScore Website http://www.computermusicnotation.com and clicking on the ‘Download’ section. Please make sure that you always have the most recent version of MaxScore on your computer.
MaxScore requires the Java SDK. In order to be able to use MaxScore you will need to have a proper version of Java already installed in your operating system. If not, in the ‘Download’ section of MaxScore Website you will find the option to download the Java SDK. Just click on the ‘Get the Java SDK for your operating System’, chose the version suitable for your operating system and install it.
If you don’t have a proper version of Java, MaxScore will let you know by the moment you open it. A URL will pop up on the top of the window and it will redirect you to the equivalent site for you to install Java.
After the download and installation has completed, you should be ready to go.
